derivation: a primitive root; also denominatively (from H6106 (עֶצֶם))
strongs_def: to bind fast, i.e. close (the eyes); intransitively, to be (causatively, make) powerful or numerous; to crunch the bones
kjv_def: break the bones, close, be great, be increased, be (wax) mighty(-ier), be more, shut, be(-come, make) strong(-er).
